parameters.name: buf_p
parameters.description:
A pointer to a buffer that contains an exportable, contiguous, persistent form of the ACL
  that you want to copy.

full_content:
Function: acl_copy_int
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_copy_int.html
Synopsis: acl_t acl_copy_int( const void *buf_p );
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - buf_p: A pointer to a buffer that contains an exportable, contiguous, persistent form of the ACL
  that you want to copy.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

acl_t acl_copy_int( const void *buf_p );
